amendatorysection.para: Any person violating the provisions of section 54-753.01 or any rule or regulation made pursuant thereto shall be guilty of a Class IV misdemeanor. Each day the provisions of section 54-753.01 or any rule or regulation made pursuant thereto is violated shall be a separate offense.

source.para: Laws 1952, Sixty-fourth Spec. Sess., c. 5, § 3, p. 61;
